inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

inapplicable.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

inapplicable.help: Table header text should not be empty

inapplicable.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.help: Form elements must have labels

inapplicable.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > header:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(5) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1)
